title.rendered: “Remembering IDF’s Fallen Hero, Sgt. First Class Elkanah Nivlander: Updates and Details”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the name of an IDF fallen soldier, whose notification was delivered to his family:
https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1001202402805850

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where details and photos of the fallen soldiers are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in the battle in which Sgt. First Class (Res.) Elkanah Nivlander (May his memory be a blessing) fell, a reserve soldier from the 7220 battalion, ‘Yiftach’ (11) brigade, was seriously injured.

The soldier was evacuated for medical treatment at the hospital, his family has been updated.
